summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York, dated July 27, 2021, forwarding a link to a Times article titled 'our-naked-ambition-makes-it-hard-to-believe-youre-a-jeffrey-epstein-' and suggesting the recipient ask the press office if they can access it. The document appears to be internal communication regarding media coverage related to Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.context: The sender of the email, forwarding a link to a Times article about Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Subject of the linked Times article titled 'our-naked-ambition-makes-it-hard-to-believe-youre-a-jeffrey-epstein-'.

events.title: Internal Email Regarding Epstein Article
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney sends an email containing a link to a Times article about Jeffrey Epstein, suggesting the recipient ask the press office if they can access it.
personsInvolved: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York

keyFacts: An Assistant U.S. Attorney in the SDNY was monitoring or sharing a Times article about Jeffrey Epstein in July 2021.
The email suggests internal coordination or interest within the U.S. Attorney's office regarding media coverage of Epstein.
The Times article's title implies critical coverage questioning Epstein's persona or actions.
